Html:
Hi

How can I change tooltip type to ballon tooltip ?

Regards ,

It seems that I found a problem.

Load a ballontooltip on a googlemap . if you zoom more than a value it get an error in tilematrix.cs  in this function GetTileWithNoLock 

   Levels[zoom].TryGetValue(p, out ret);

ERROR MESSAGE:

Index was out of range. Must be non-negative and less than the size of the collection.
Parameter name: index

there is no map with 22 levels of zoom ;}

p.s. i've commented line just to increase performance: //if(zoom < Levels.Count)
